definition: to try to draw a tiger but end up with a likeness of a dog (idiom)/to try to do sth overambitious and end up botching it
pinyin: hua4 hu3 bu4 cheng2 fan3 lei4 quan3

definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: Tiger painting is not like a dog, political corruption appears irresponsible.
sentences.chinese: 畫虎不成反類犬，政治出現不負責任的腐化。
